channel.title: [508]I need to make safe zone, but won't work
channel.description:
alright.. I am trying to make this are a safe zone... in camelot, there is this office that I want safe so I can use as like a jail/Help area. I have the corner coords, and have looked for a tutorial on how to do this but can't find any on a 508 server :/, so I wanted to know how to make this a safe zone.. I have corner coords, northeast and southwest, here they are.
northeast: 2740 3473 southwest: 2731 3464
this is the code I tried to use [code](x >= 2740 && x <= 2731 && y >= 3473 && y <= 3464) ||[/code] any ideas on why it won't work?? I looked at a 317 tutorial, and look at the other safe zones, and just copied one of them, and changed coords around, but it won't work :/ help?

item.title: [508]I need to make safe zone, but won't work
item.dc:creator: @halolouis halolouis
item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

forget ne sw shit. X >= smallx && X<= bigx && Y >= smally && Y <= bigy. This creates a box.

Read full topic

so I put the coords in backwards?
you put southwest’s first, then northeast’s?

alright… I am trying to make this are a safe zone… in camelot, there is this office that I want safe so I can use as like a jail/Help area. I have the corner coords, and have looked for a tutorial on how to do this but can’t find any on a 508 server :/, so I wanted to know how to make this a safe zone… I have corner coords, northeast and southwest, here they are.

northeast: 2740 3473

this is the code I tried to use

(x >= 2740 && x <= 2731 && y >= 3473 && y <= 3464) ||
